pages.title: Thaumic Computers
pages.text: This mod adds drivers allowing OpenComputers to access Thaumcrafts blocks and items.

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: $(l)For blocks:$()$(br)1. Place an OpenComputers adapter next to a Thaumcraft block.$(br)2. The connected computer will see an aspect_container item in its components which reads the contents of the block.$(br)$(l)For items:$()$(br)1. Place an OpenComputers adapter or robot with an inventory controller upgrade next to a chest.$(br)2. Items in the inventory will include the Thaumcraft aspects on them.

$(l)For Golem Seals:$()$(br)1. Craft a Golem Seal Connector in a standard crafting table.$(br)2. Right click on a seal while sneaking to bind the connector to that seal.$(br)3. Place the seal connector into an adapter in the same dimension.
